website_summaries.verdict: Tall, sturdy side keeps your food in the basket and out of your steaming water.
pros: Comes in a variety of sizes to fit your pressure cooker
Handle has been tested to lift more than 20 pounds
No silicone legs to harbor bacteria
3/4-inch steel legs keeps your food out of the water
Easy to put in and take out
cons: Removable handle sometimes comes off when you don't want it to

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Steamed broccoli in this basket last night and turned out perfectly! Still need potholder for rubber handle when lifting out. Easy to clean! Using it again tonight for zoodles... love this product!
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn R.

customer_reviews.title: We love this basket.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes it would fit my Power Cooker Plus pressure cooker and it fits perfectly in the inner pot of our cooker, we are use it constantly to cook our vegetables and most likely anything else we would want to use it for. The shape and depth are great, and the little feet on the bottom of the basket are nice to keep it off of the bottom of the pot so your food is not sitting in water while it cooks. The silicone tubing that covers the handle of the basket makes it easy to lift out the basket without burning your hands, another nice feature. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the steamer basket! First time use was for cubed potatoes to make potato salad and eggs sat on top of the potatoes for hard boiled eggs to add to the salad. Both turned out excellent. Basket is easy to use & lightweight. Thank you also for the Instant Pot holiday recipe download!
customer_reviews.author: Ricki E.

customer_reviews.title: Great food remover!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to using an IP. The first food I cooked was hard boiled eggs. I used the trivet included with the IP and then tongs to remove the hot eggs. My next item was broccoli. After that I decided my first accessory purchase would be a basket to contain the hot foods for removal from the pot without spillage. This one works nicely. The strainer basket is tightly woven which made it easy to rinse my rice before cooking. I love the ease in emptying the pot now when cooking eggs etc. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The basket I purchased fits perfectly in my Duo 80. I think the price is a bit high. However, it is well-made, sturdy and shiny. When I make boiled eggs, I just put all eggs in the basket and place it in the inner pot. When it is ready, I just pick up the basket with the red handle. I don't need a tong to move one by one. You can do the same for potatoes and other veggies. The basket is especially useful when you steam for example cut potatoes. Unlike the trivet, small pieces won't fall into the water and melt away.
customer_reviews.author: CMF

customer_reviews.title: Great for instant pots! Fits 5qt, too!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my 5qt instant pot. I like that I can take off the handle and I like the height of the legs. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: A Salant

customer_reviews.title: Love this Steamer!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great steamer basket that fits perfectly inside my 6 qt. Instant Pot Ultra!! It's very sturdy, has a removable handle and has feet so it sits up out of any liquid below. It comes to within 3/4" of the top of the Instant Pot insert, so in other words, there's lots of space for your favorite foods! I've used it already to make my own pizza sauce by steaming Roma tomatoes and onions in the basket. Even ran it through the dishwasher and it came out with no problems. If I have to buy another one, this is the one I'm getting again. It's about as perfect as a steamer basket can be!
customer_reviews.author: D. Self

customer_reviews.title: Rust!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this product one time in my instant pot and noticed now it’s rusted. Love the idea of doing my hard boiled eggs in this basket and it worked great. But after one use it shouldn’t rust for the price. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: D. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Rust spots after only 3 uses!
customer_reviews.text: After only three times used in a large stock pot (Viking 6-quart stainless steel) and washed in the dishwasher, the mesh of the basket has multiple rust spots. I'm very disappointed. Returned for a refund. Will have to search for another basket for steaming vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design & Quality
customer_reviews.text: The handle pops off when lifted out of the pot. The ends of the handle that push through the basket are too short to bend upward with pliers to prevent the handle from popping off. Not worth 26 bucks, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. Shell

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this item 3 times and washed it 3 times. It's supposed to be dishwasher safe and stainless steel. It has started to discolor on the feet and rust at the cross section already.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C.

customer_reviews.title: Dented , and Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This basket was dented all over, it came in a plastic bag ,no box cover. There’s nothing to send it back in ,UPS ground ( just to return this )and their mailbox won’t fit in it, so returning it will be a big hassle I guess I’m stuck with it. Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: SHARKY

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit 8qt. Why would you even make this if it doesn't fit? The fake reviews got me on this one ugh.
customer_reviews.author: oldschool

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than tongs.
customer_reviews.text: I like this steamer. I originally bought it with soups and broths in mind but I use it for other things as well. I have used it mostly for chicken wings in my 8 qt instant pot. Now I don't have to fish out individual wings with tongs or a spoon. I can just pick up the entire batch by the silicone covered handle, drain them and toss them on a sheet pan to brown and crisp up. I will be doing this tonight actually. I am glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N.W.E.

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened to the reviewer who said that the handle falls in on top of your food.
customer_reviews.text: Yes the handle falls in and must be propped up with a knife or fork running across the basket unless someone has a better idea. Very poorly made in that respect. I have two other smaller baskets which are properly made and have a rim which holds the handle up and doesn't allow the handle to fall into the strainer. Very disappointed as I don't want whatever is in the silicone or plastic sitting on my food while it is cooking. I do like the smaller mesh. I have only used it once for vegetables and it worked out fine with the exception of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sashi

customer_reviews.title: Way too big!
customer_reviews.text: I believe I have an 8 quart Instant Pot and this is advertised for both 6 and 8 quart. It is too big, there is no way it would fit in a 6 quart. I am sending it back and have ordered another Bummed, I was hoping to use it today!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Doggett

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition w/ the Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't buy this as $29 seemed a little steep. But it's a nice addition to the Instant Pot. Pop in your eggs and then you can easily take them out to chill in ice water w/ out having to individually pull each egg. You can steam in it. You can take a frozen pound of ground beef and cook it in here in a few minutes and boom, a base to many dinners is ready. So if you are using your Instant Pot, this is a super nice option to have handy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Instant Pot steaming
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time steaming a pound of baby spinach leaves in my Instant Pot. It seems like a sturdy tool, one I have been waiting a long time to find for the Instant Pot. It goes through the dishwasher just fine. I used a pot holder to grip the handle when the spinach was cooked. It is one of those kitchen gadgets that brings me joy because it solves a real problem of how to steam vegetables off the water in the Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Small learning curve to get clean and dry
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my 3qt. Also works in my 6qt. Sturdy, well made, quality piece. Should stand up to the test of time. Only thing to be aware of is food particles can get stuck up under the rim and be difficult to wash out. A toothpick works. Then, don't flip it upside down to dry or it will hold water under that rim.
customer_reviews.author: StacyS

customer_reviews.title: .handle is awful
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I like this strainer and use it often, when I first got it and was using it to blanch some vegetables I could smell this awful odor. I cut off the plastic covering on the handle and still use the strainer, but have to use pot holders. I am amazed how companies don't find these problems or test them out before manufacturing and selling to customers.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Fits Instant Pot IP Lux 6 quart. Stainless steel seems of good quality and does not rust in dishwasher. I use it for shrimp boils in my Instant Pot, as well as for rinsing small items like quinoa, barley, and lentils under the kitchen faucet. I also use it in my stock pot for steaming on the stove, fits perfectly with stock pot lid on top. The only thing I'd point out is because of the finer mesh, it can be difficult to clean. Lentils can get stuck under the lip. I would recommend putting in dishwasher every time to save time rinsing and hand-washing.
customer_reviews.author: Gino La Grache

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small
customer_reviews.text: The design is good, But it is very small compared to what the Photos Make it Look Like. I don't think that this is actually 3 Quarts or the photo doesn't show the 3 Quart Basket once you choose your size. It Sure doesn't fit into my "Instant pot" the way the advertised Photo shows. The one I purchased looks like a toy compared to the advertised Photo. I will keep the one I have, I just won't be able as much in it as I thought I would be able to. Maybe about Half.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I use this to steam and when I'm using the air fryer in my 8qt duo crisp. I use it in the air fryer to do anything in pieces, like breakfast potatoes. They don't stick and when I want to jostle them around it is east to grab the handle & bounce stuff around. I don't really understand why the handle is coated in silicon, it is always too to to handle without a pot holder while cooking. My handle would slip down into the base. I just grabbed it with both hands and bent it a little. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Pie

customer_reviews.title: Really great for several different functions
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. I am a vegan so I eat lots of veggies. I also love my instant pot (oddly I don't use the pressure function alot) I DO use the yogurt function, slow cook, and all the other functions. This holds a TON of veggies, pasta or orzo, or beans that you may put through several washings or steamings. LOVE LOVE LOVE it. Just make sure you get the right size. If you don't have it yet, get the lid that goes with your size so you can cook without the pressure lid for the saute function and if you just want to use it as a countertop electric pot.
customer_reviews.author: SP BisbeeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Like size and quality
customer_reviews.text: It fits in my 6 qt Mealthy Insta Pot and should also work in other brands. I like being able to stack & layer more veggies etc. in my pot. I wanted stainless steel and it looks like a quality product. I liked the feet not being coated with silicon (as some reviewers made a good point about things getting down in around their silicon edges and no being to clean it out). The handle is coated with silicon but easy to cut off even though maybe not as necessary as it’s not sitting in the water, broth, or droppings in the bottom on the inner pan.
customer_reviews.author: McBee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the quality, feels cheap and cost for this item is high for this quality. Handle poops off, definitely wouldn’t hold the 20 lbs in weight as picture leads you to believe. Also basket screen was dented in multiple areas. Too much of a hassle for exchange so kept it but definitely not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: tljenkins27

customer_reviews.title: Love this Salbree 3 qt Steamer Basket
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice stainless steel Salbree, 3 quart Steamer Basket. The insert from the company states it's 304 grade. It's easy to use and remove from my 3 quart Mini Duo Plus Instant Pot. It fits perfect. The silicon over the handle is nice for removing. The handle rests on the side and not inside or on top of the food. It cleans up nice with no problem with food getting stuck on the inside metal rim. Since I use my 3 quart almost daily, this insert will get plenty of use. Very happy with this purchase and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a quart Insta pot, and I was so happy to come across a product that I felt would be a great addition to this appliance. I gladly bought this product with no hesitation. And you can imagine my disappointment with this would not fit. I can’t even begin to express how much I wish I,had taken some of the other reviews seriously. I will not recommend this , as far as I’m concerned it is a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: NELLZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Using it with my Instant Pot to hard boiled eggs faster than on the stovetop.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk without the handle that is supposed to be attached
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered without the most important part of the basket .... NO HANDLE ... for the price Impaid I demand either a replacement or a handle shipped to me
customer_reviews.author: txstarkeeper

customer_reviews.title: lifted the whole basket out when they were done and dunked the whole basket of eggs in a big bowl of ice water to stop the cooking process and it made it so easy! I feel like I can steam a larger ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a steamer basket to use in my Instant Pot thinking I'd get one of those flower shaped things. After seeing this basket, it just makes so much more sense to use this design! I made 15 hard boiled-eggs at once in my instant pot, lifted the whole basket out when they were done and dunked the whole basket of eggs in a big bowl of ice water to stop the cooking process and it made it so easy! I feel like I can steam a larger amount of food using this basket.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Artz

customer_reviews.title: It’s an Instapot necessity!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for myself for Christmas. I love it! I have used it a handful of times in my 6qt instapot and enjoy the ease! Just plop in the veggies, chopped potatoes, etc and then steam! The rubber is a little too warm to touch if you’re impatient like me and want your food taken it right away but just use a hand towel or mitten! It’s easy to clean with a brush. I do not have a dishwasher so I can’t comment on how well it holds up. I’ll update when I’ve used it longer!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia fennell

customer_reviews.title: Holds 36 eggs
customer_reviews.text: *Update October 27, 2018. It absolutely easily holds 36 eggs. Wish I had bought it sooner.* I honestly haven't used it yet, just arrived yesterday. I'm sure the dimensions are in the description but I assumed it was almost as tall as the insta pot. It's really short, about 4". May not suit my purpose. Looks sturdy enough, I will update after I actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: JeanM

customer_reviews.title: Many Uses - Perfect for Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been one of my most used kitchen purchases. I use it for the Instant Pot, of course - as advertised. It is easy to pull out with the silicone coated handle. I use it as an all purpose strainer in the kitchen, and even pick Blackberries with it in the back yard and bring them right into the house for washing. Can't really go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: MOCK66

customer_reviews.title: Clean it thoroughly before first use!
customer_reviews.text: The product was just okay. I did find some "grease spots" under the silicon handle when I open the package. I wasn't sure what it was, and I had to wipe those spots really hard with paper towel... And washed it thoroughly before the fist use. It was okay for what I ordered it for. However, I wasn't really please that a brand new item would have the grease or rusted spots on it already.
customer_reviews.author: Di W.

customer_reviews.title: Love handle. Makes it easy to lift when cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 6 qt. Instant pot perfectly. Love handle. Makes it easy to lift when cooking such things as potatoes, yams, eggs, corn cobs. Good quality. Best to wash right away or soak before food particles get dry and crusted in. Otherwise hard to wash the dried food out of all the little holes.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne, Los Angeles CA

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderful in an Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to cook my "boiled" eggs in the Instant Pot. It is perfect and I can cook as many eggs as I want (haven't gone over 12 or 14 at one time). After the eggs have cooked, it's easy to lift the basket (with hot pad) out of the Instant Pot and plunge into another pot filled with water to cool the eggs. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R. Rodriquez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome accessory for my instant pot!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, LOVE this basket! It fits perfectly in my 8 qt. Instant Pot. I've been using it a lot the past few weeks. I can easily fit 18 eggs in it to hard boil them (the 5-5-5 method works great for me), and it is also perfect for steaming ears of corn. The feet keep the items up above the liquid - although it WILL fit on top of the trivet that came with the pot as well - and the silicone handle stays cool, which makes it easy to remove from the pot. It's dishwasher safe, and it fits in my top rack nicely. Highly recommended for Instant Pot users!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Good construction, fit & finish! I elected to remove the silicone protective strap as I didn't want it sitting in there with my food. Removal was pretty straight forward (I did need to use a pair of pliers as the handle was well secured into the basket). With the silicone removed, we just use a cloth to grab the handle. Overall, very happy with this purchase; and more importantly my wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: aTypicalEngineer808

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for doing items in my pressure cooker such as vegetables, eggs, potatoes. Easy to clean except when I've cooked broccoli. Some of it won't come out of the basket. Ran it through the dishwasher that seemed to help a little bit as the time I wash it by hand. And I store it right in the pressure cooker when not in use. To very easy and convenient basket
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have accessory for the 3 quart Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Fit's in a 3 quart instantpot perfectly. It's all stainless steel and it has little legs to keep it up off of the bottom. I usually use about 350 ml of water when using it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Esteban

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay.
customer_reviews.text: The handle is always coming off and the price has more than doubled since I purchased it in October.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great for making huge batches of eggs!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, especially when I need to make a batch of deviled eggs for a party! I've gotten 24 eggs in at once and could honestly have fit in some more. It's easy to clean, especially since you're really only using it for steaming hot water. It's great that the handle is insulated so you can actually handle it straight out of the instant pot.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a quart Insta pot.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a very well-built steamer basket. The only problem is I bought it for my 8 quart ultra Insta pot. Even though it says it fits in a 8 quart it does not.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does exactly what it needed. The only negatives I’ll say is it is a little difficult to clean depending on what you made, and the handle doesn’t stay put. It usually falls down, which causes it to rest on the food you are steaming. It’s be great if it stayed to the side of the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Derek H

customer_reviews.title: great addition to my Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have a large steamer pan and sometimes small items would drop through the grid. This is perfect for small items and may double as a colandar to rinse small amount of items or as a drainer/strainer. Every kitchen need at least one.
customer_reviews.author: billjustbill

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have for your Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to cook potato's in the Instant Pot using the "Steam" setting. The "feet" keep the potato's from sitting in water at the bottom of the pot. After the potatoes are cooked, I just throw the basket in the dishwasher. It has a rubber grip on the handle so it's easy to lift out of the Instant pot. I really love this tool.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beste

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but tall and great for vegetables and boiled eggs in the instant pot
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Instant Pot so I can cook vegetables and smaller things and get them out of the pot easier. It works very well, and the handle is nice. It is very pricey, but it was the tallest thing I could find to put vegetables in. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Opal S J

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: This sieve/steamer basket is perfect for larger straining needs. You can rinse rice without it escaping out the holes. It's large enough to do heavier duty than the small sieves. I'm sure it's great in the InstaPots and pressure cookers as well although that is not what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Daniel

customer_reviews.title: So much better than steamer clam shell
customer_reviews.text: Cooking eggs and potatoes are much easier in this basket. you can also remove the whole basket at the end of cooking times and go straight to running cold water to cool eggs down. Much better than having to transfer them with tongs to another bowl or strainer
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: fits the pot but quality is just so-so
customer_reviews.text: we bought it to fit in the 8 qt instant pot, while the fitting is good, but the mesh wires are thin and shape deforms easily. Some of the corners were already bent/deformed upon shipment since the packaging was very poor, we had to return it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Trani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use in my IP
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 6QT IP-Duo perfectly! Using it for SO many things now! No modifications required!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: ... hard boiled eggs at a time and it was perfect. Also used it to put in the vegetables ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it to cook 12 hard boiled eggs at a time and it was perfect. Also used it to put in the vegetables and chicken for chicken soup. Works great and the silicone handle makes it easy to lift the steamer off the pot without getting burned.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must-have for the instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the #1 accessory for the Instant Pot. It's great for making boiled eggs, steamed vegetables, potatoes, all kinds of things. I've bought a lot of IP accessories and this is the one I use all the time. This particular one is good quality. No need to pay twice as much for other brands.
customer_reviews.author: B. CAIN

customer_reviews.title: Fits multiple sizes of pressure cookers
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time,seems to be made well. I bought this because it fit in my pressure cookers . I have several different sizes of pressure cookers and fits them. Bought to steam vegetables and to make hard boiled eggs. Have discovered that my small cake pans that I use in my pressure cooker fits inside the basket so I can place them inside the basket and take them in and out of the pressure cooker without have to make a sling. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Leonard bates

customer_reviews.title: You need this basket for your Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.text: This basket!! I absolutely love it!! I don’t know why all Instant Pots don’t come with this basket. It makes steaming vegetables so easy! You just throw them in the basket, rinse them in there and pop it in the IP. The rubber handle cools quickly afterwards when you’re pulling them out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Just got my steamer basket today. I washed it and I used it. I am very satisfied and happy I bout it. Its the perfect size basket for my 3qrt pot. I used it to steam tamales and they came out perfect. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Works with 6 qt instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my 6 qt instant pot and it fits great. Little legs keep it elevated off the bottom of the pot. Easy to get out of instant pot because of handle. Sturdy so far. Rinse right away to make it easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: This looks really nice in person
customer_reviews.text: This looks really nice in person. It's very nice quality. The problem? It DOES NOT fit into the Instant Pot 6 QT Duo liner...not even close. The description has to be updated. NOW, I have to pay to return it. What's right about that???? Exactly, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M. Watt

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose and is easy to use and clean but after only 2 uses its rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Faloon

customer_reviews.title: While it works great, the construction seems a bit flimsy with the ...
customer_reviews.text: This basket fits perfectly inside the IP 6 quart. While it works great, the construction seems a bit flimsy with the netting double folded under the rim. Handle is great for easy removal from pot. Small legs allow water underneath for steaming. Holds a dozen eggs, veges and more.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Magic

customer_reviews.title: Just one problem
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with the strainer has nothing to do with its effectiveness. Where the wire mesh is joined to the band at the top there are several places where the mesh has been folded. This has the appearance of a pleat.
customer_reviews.author: ALeon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was a decidedly great purchase for my Instant Pot! I've already used it twice ... once for making chicken stock (yay for not having to pick out all the bones!). No rubber feet to clean; mesh is small enough to keep contents in place. No "steel" taste attached to food. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Marialg

customer_reviews.title: Salbree Steamer basket perfect for Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.text: Love this steamer basket! Fits perfectly in my Instant Pot Ultra 6qt., and so easy to remove from pot with the convenient handle. I have used it to steam vegetables, to hardcook eggs in my Instant Pot. I also make bone broth often in my Instant Pot, and use this steamer basket to hold the bones and veggies -- makes quick work of taking all the solids out at once! Plus it is very well made and goes right into my dishwasher for easy cleaning. Great accessory to have for your Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.author: IJPBklyn

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: Very large and great shape. Sits by itself to drain or fits in the pot. Small screen holds small particles. Haven't tried it with rice yet. Handle is very useful, but needs some kind of restraint to keep it from falling inside. I used a spring loaded paper clip on top of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Not really working for me
customer_reviews.text: So, I give this a bad rating only because it doesn’t fit my instantpot. It won’t even go in. I thought I had the right size, but, I don’t know.
customer_reviews.author: lbreader

customer_reviews.title: Another great thing I didn't know I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I first used this basket for a pork tenderloin filet with apples. It was perfect. It fit perfectly in the Instant Pot, it kept the food out of the gravy, it was easy to lift out, easy to clean. Multiple tiers of racks are useful for some things but things slide off. This basket will be useful for many more.
customer_reviews.author: DLD

customer_reviews.title: I’m not steamed at how well this product works!
customer_reviews.text: An awesome steamer basket! It perfectly fits in my 8-quart Instant Pot. So far, I’ve used it to steam broccoli, turnip greens, Kale, spinach and carrots. They all turned out perfect and the steamer basket easily contained each. I‘d buy this product again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Texian Punisher

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it! We use this almost as often as we use our Instant Pot. I purchased it for veggies - which are fabulous with it. I also use it for potatoes and eggs. The handle has a silicon wrap so you can grab it without worrying about burning your hands. If you have an Instant Pot, you will be glad you ordered this.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sidbury

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 6 quart instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I especially liked this basket for making boiled eggs. I'm new at using the instant pot so haven't used the basket much. I did have to bend or adjust the handle so it would stay in the basket. No problem.
customer_reviews.author: RudysMom

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Love the Silicone Handle!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this insert in my Instant Pot for frozen shrimp, hard boiled eggs, and last night I made frozen broccoli and salmon (at the same time!). I clean it in the dishwasher (bottom) and it comes out fine, because it is difficult to clean it by hand, being a mesh basket. It's sturdy and fits great, and I store all my trivets, spoons and my power cord in it while my Pot isn't in use.
customer_reviews.author: CasualNJGal

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer Basket.
customer_reviews.text: We used it the next day after it arrived. It is very sturdy and light. We were impressed with the quality. We cooked a rusett and sweet potato together. They came out beautifully. We have another electric steamer ordered and will probably order another.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tommie

customer_reviews.title: 6qt Steamer Basket for Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and fits inside my instant pot perfectly. I used it to steam some hard boiled eggs as soon as I received it. It worked great. Should last for a long time, stainless is pretty tough. Feel its worth every penny I paid if not more.
customer_reviews.author: Daddio

customer_reviews.title: Built-in feet
customer_reviews.text: I just received this, I haven't even set up my instant pot yet. I especially like the built in feet on this basket, no separate racks to track or clean. I'm hoping it won't rust, I know that slightly different types of stainless can cause rust in one another. My friends love the instant pot, hope I do, too.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Catron

customer_reviews.title: This Is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed a basket for my Instant-Pot that had sides and a handle. This turned out perfect for my uses in my 6 qt. cooker. It also eliminated the need to buy more accessories, as it can be used for a number of applications. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S. Tencza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Steamer Basket for the Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: It's great to cook vegetables or eggs in. It's so easy to remove the eggs now and put the eggs into another container with ice water in it. I recommend it and wish I'd have gotten this long ago!
customer_reviews.author: jukeboxjewel

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in my 8 quart IP
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in my 8 quart IP. It was not as tall as i was expecting from some of the other reviews, but works well. If it was about an inch taller, I would like it just a little bit more, but the quality is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Steam away!/
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely pleased with this item. I used it the day after delivery.I was able to steam a basket of sweet potatoes in the instapot with ease.easy to clean after use. I placed in dishwasher and it cleaned up wonderfullly. I would recommend this basket if steaming items in your inst a pot.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great,fits 8 qt Instant Pot perfectly,sometimes can be a pain to clean if food sticks in it, but that's the trade off for a small mesh basket that nothing falls out of
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to use in my Instant Pot. I've used it to steam vegetables and to boil eggs. It fits perfectly in the 6-quart size. I read that you do not want the steamer with plastic on the legs because it holds bacteria. I do like the fact that there is a plastic coated handle on this. It makes it so easy to remove from the larger pot.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G.

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is made to last and makes cooking with boiling water much safer. Boiling potatoes are much easier, I can steam vegetables, boil eggs, wash fruit and vegetables, there are many uses. The coated handles are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Fits my non Instant Pot pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: My first pressure cooker accessory... Love this steamer basket! I don’t have an instant pot but I do have a power pressure cooker deluxe and it fits perfectly! I used it recently to steam artichokes and made it so easy to remove them from inside the pot. No more squishing them with tongs.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: How did i live without this?
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer basket for my instant pot! I put potatoes in it and it's super easy to remove the basket when the cooking is done without having any of the potatoes fall out (as they did when I used the traditional steamer basket). I can see using this for so many recipes and feel that this was money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Joyous

customer_reviews.title: This basket is perfect for the 6 qt Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.text: I love this basket! Fits 6 qt instant pot perfectly and the silicone covered handle makes it easy to remove from boiling water. Don’t know how I lived without it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila polhemus

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel coating wore off after 6 uses
customer_reviews.text: This is designed well, but typical of products manufactured in China, "stainless steel" is only the coating, which comes off. The feet of this ended up without the coating after 6 uses and caused a rust spot in the bottom of my instant pot liner, which apparently is also only "stainless steel" coated. The bottom of this basket is now starting to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Best basket for steaming in pressure cooker or on stove
customer_reviews.text: Great size, well made. I use this for almost half our needs to steam vegetables, even large quantities like a head of cauliflower or 3 pounds of large carrots.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Bolender

customer_reviews.title: A very usable item for your instapot
customer_reviews.text: I have used this basket in my instapot (5 at) for several weeks. I wash it easily by hand after use and have had no rust. The handle has remained strong. It is perfect for cooking hard boiled eggs and steaming vegetables. I love mine and you will too!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Love this strainer!  For my instant pot!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting an instant pot for a very long time. When I saw the strainer I knew I had to have it. I am so glad i purchased this strainer, it is easy to take out, easy to put in and just learning of all the different ways I can use it! works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Love mine.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my Instant Pot and even as a colander to clean my rice, spinach, etc. The handle allows me to take it out after it's done in the pot, no worries about burning my hands or fingers. High-quality mesh material, firm shape, it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Gone with the Kale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for DUO 6
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself and another for my son for DUO 6 IP. I cook chili in mine. Line it with a Reynolds slow cooker bag, add 2 cups water to bottom of IP, place chili ingredients inside lined basket (meat/onions saute before), push Chili/Beans button and wait. Great, no-stick chili!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly into my Instant Pot and is exactly what I was looking for. I can make bone broth easily and simply now. Everything goes into the basket and when it's cooked, I just lift everything out. No sloopy straining mess. Woohoo! :-) 0
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This works great for making potato salad in my Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: This works great for making potato salad in my Instant Pot. Throw the peeled , diced potatoes & uncooked eggs in for four minutes & boom the work is done! Haven't tried it for veggies or other things yet. The handle is a great feature for removing it from the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: A necessary Instant Pot accessory!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it specifically for making bone broth - no more messy scooping!! Just lift (super sturdy basket) & let all the liquid drain into the pot & done!! The silicone handle is a really great touch for not burning yourself on the handle. It’s a handy accessory and I use it for so much more now!!
customer_reviews.author: C. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: This basket works perfect in the instant pot when steaming vegetables and for ...
customer_reviews.text: This basket works perfect in the instant pot when steaming vegetables and for making hard boiled eggs
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent accessory!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the steamer accessory I have been looking for - way easier than the "flower-type" steamer (which has served me well). Perfect fit with my 3 qt Instant Pot. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Phil S.

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: With 5 kids and always friends over, It was very important to me that the steamer basket be dish washer safe. (That's the main reason I bought it.) So far, I have had made hard boiled eggs and steamed cut up potatoes for a potato salad. The basket has held up nicely so far. I liked that it is stainless steal product with the promise of not rusting.
customer_reviews.author: BBlunck

customer_reviews.title: The Original Salbree 8qt Steamer Basket for Instant Pot Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make my bone broth, and believe me it makes my job so much easier and clean up is more than half as much work. I wish I would have had it a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Cubby

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and usefullness
customer_reviews.text: Great construction and fits my 6 qt instant pot perfectly. Used the 5-5-5 method for hard-cooked eggs and the eggs come out perfectly and the shell was very easy to peel. Also works great for steamed vegtables...lovre it!
customer_reviews.author: Mkt Guy

customer_reviews.title: Basket cooker
customer_reviews.text: This basket is perfect for the 3 Qt Instant Pot. I have one just like it for my 6 Qt Instant Pot and cook eggs or potatoes in it. Other veggies tend to get too mushy in the IP so I don’t use it for that. This works better for steaming than the stainless insert with holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: I got one for my 3 qt instant pot and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got one for my 3 qt instant pot and one for my 6 qt-they fit perfectly! They are well made and the handle is ideal for helping to get it out of the hot pot! Am using them the first time tonight to make steamed cauliflower and fresh green beans!
customer_reviews.author: eileenjude

product_meta.title: Original Salbree Steamer Basket for 6qt Instant Pot Accessories, Stainless Steel Strainer and Insert fits IP Insta Pot, Instapot 6qt, Other Pressure Cookers and Pots, Premium Silicone Handle
feature_bullets: BUILT-IN HANDLES FOR YOU CONVEINENCE- No more having to reach deep into your insta pot to retrieve your favorite accessory. Our patent-pending egg bite mold has permanently attached handles, that clip together, making removing this instantpot tray easily removable.

INSTANT-POT COMPATIBLE - PATENT PENDING - designed to fit IP-DUO60 6 Qt 7-in-1 Multi-Use Programmable Pressure Cooker, LUX60 V3 6 Qt 6-in-1, Instant Pot Ultra 6 Qt 10-in-1 Multi-Use Programmable Pressure Cooker, but will fit many other pots and pressure cookers, including the Power Pressure Cooker XL models. Also fits the Aroma 20 cup Rice Cooker & Ninja Foodi Accessories.

STAINLESS STEEL CONSTRUCTION & SOLID REINFORCEMENT ON FOUR SIDES AND TOP RIM - - long lasting stainless steel 304 material is dishwasher safe, solid construction adds strength and stability to the strainer basket and handle has been tested to lift up to 20 pounds, much more than needed.

CONVENIENT SINGLE-HANDLE DESIGN- Sometimes you only have one free hand, while cooking your eggs, meats or vegetables, our basket will allow you to lift the basket from the inner pot with one hand. Also features premium, red silicon-wrapped handle - for you comfort and convenience and fits neatly inside of basket, out the way for food.
BUILT TO LAST - this product will not to rust or fall apart.
